description.narrative: Strengthened national, local and individual capacities and responses for child protection in humanitarian situations., which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end of CP, improved and inclusive access to well-coordinated national and local child protection services in 10 LGU's supported by a functional public sector institutional framework focused on protective elements of ECD, and promoting equity andsocial inclusion, in coordination with Social Protection and a broader Social Protection strategy.

mailing-address.narrative: 31st Floor Yuchengco Tower Rizal Commercial Banking Corporation (RCBC) Plaza 6819 Ayala Avenue corner Gil Puyat Avenue Makati City

sector.narrative: Children associated with armed forces and armed groups - prevention and response
MRM - Child protection monitoring and reporting of grave violations in armed conflict (Security Council Resolutions 1612, 1882, 1888 and 1960)

related-activity.ref: 3420/A0/05/803 IMPROVED NATIONAL AND LOCAL LEVEL PUBLIC

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national, local and individual capacities and responses for child protection in humanitarian situations.

description.narrative: Significant progress reached to implement Republic Act 10821. All 17 regions trained on this law and issued resolution to organise their Regional Child Protection Working Group. Coordination with government for grave violations sustained. Verification and response to grave violations improved at 80%. Children disengaged from MILF benefit from case management | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/01/2019

title.narrative: Number of regions who have issued resolution on RCWPG
% of reported cases of GCRVs verified and responded to
